PvtSNc.Description: Private subnet for confidential apps in us-east-1c

PvtSNd.Description: Private subnet for confidential apps in us-east-1d

PvtSNe.Description: Private subnet for confidential apps in us-east-1e CIDR: 10.168.142.0/23

NATaccessSG.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid NAT Security Group.

CheckMKSG.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid NAT Security Group.

PemKey.Description: Name of and existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instance

PemKey2.Description: Name of and existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instance

InstanceProfileUpdateServer.Description: Instance Profile Name for Update Server

Properties.DBSubnetGroupDescription: Subnets available for the RDS DB Instance

Fn::Join:
<powershell>
Initialize-Disk -Number 1 -PartitionStyle GPT -PassThru | New-Partition -AssignDriveLetter -UseMaximumSize | Format-Volume -FileSystem NTFS -AllocationUnitSize 65536
Rename-Computer -NewName MS238CPIDE25d -Restart
</powershell>
yum install -y sysstat lsof mlocate samba-client
#Change Name of server to match new hostname
useradd -m -g aix -c "James Owen, Cloud Enablement Team" jowe6212
useradd -m -g aix -c "Mike Rowland, Enterprise Architect" mrow7849
useradd -m -g aix -c "Fernando Nieto, App Dev" fnie6886
useradd -m -g aix -c "Sagar Shetty, App Dev" sshe7956
# Set System Environment and Tomcat JVM Heap size
# Set Tomcat to restart after every reboot
sh -c echo "@reboot logger \"SYSTEM REBOOTED..Starting Tomcat...\" && /usr/local/tomcat8/bin/startup.sh" | crontab -
# Configure to run as a deployment client
# Configure forwarder to send logs to Splunk Indexer

#!/bin/bash -v
date > /home/ec2-user/starttime
yum update -y aws-cfn-bootstrap
yum update -y wget
yum update -y curl
# Set Timezone
timedatectl set-timezone UTC
# Install lsof locate and smbclient
yum install -y sysstat lsof mlocate samba-client
#Change Name of server to match new hostname
hostname lx238cpodsql01d.na.sysco.net
echo lx238cpodsql01d.na.sysco.net > /etc/hostname

# sh -c "hostname  cpodsql-$(curl http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/local-ipv4/ -s)d.na.sysco.net"
#sh -c "echo  cpodsql-$(curl http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/local-ipv4/ -s)d.na.sysco.net" > /etc/hostname
####################################
#Add Users to server
####################################
useradd -m -g aix -c "James Owen, Cloud Enablement Team" jowe6212
useradd -m -g aix -c "Mike Rowland, Enterprise Architect" mrow7849
useradd -m -g aix -c "Fernando Nieto, App Dev" fnie6886
useradd -m -g aix -c "Sagar Shetty, App Dev" sshe7956
####################################
# Download and Install MS SQL Server 2017
####################################
cd /tmp
# curl https://packages.microsoft.com/config/rhel/7/mssql-server.repo > /etc/yum.repos.d/mssql-server.repo
# yum install -y mssql-server
####################################
# Increase open file limits
####################################
sh -c "echo \"*   soft   nofile   10240\" >> /etc/security/limits.conf"
sh -c "echo \"*   hard   nofile   20240\" >> /etc/security/limits.conf"
####################################
# Install Splunk Universal Forwarder
####################################
cd /tmp
wget -O splunkforwarder-6.6.1-aeae3fe0c5af-linux-2.6-x86_64.rpm 'https://www.splunk.com/bin/splunk/DownloadActivityServlet?architecture=x86_64&platform=linux&version=6.6.1&product=universalforwarder&filename=splunkforwarder-6.6.1-aeae3fe0c5af-linux-2.6-x86_64.rpm&wget=true'
chmod 744 splunkforwarder-6.6.1-aeae3fe0c5af-linux-2.6-x86_64.rpm
rpm -i splunkforwarder-6.6.1-aeae3fe0c5af-linux-2.6-x86_64.rpm
cd /opt/splunkforwarder
./bin/splunk start --accept-license
./bin/splunk enable boot-start
# Configure to run as a deployment client
#-----------------------------------
./bin/splunk set deploy-poll splunkdeploy.na.sysco.net:8089 -auth admin:changeme
# Configure forwarder to send logs to Splunk Indexer
#-----------------------------------
./bin/splunk add forward-server splunkindex.na.sysco.net:9997 -auth admin:changeme
./bin/splunk restart
####################################
# Install CodeDeploy
####################################
yum install ruby -y
wget https://aws-codedeploy-us-east-1.s3.amazonaws.com/latest/install
chmod +x ./install
./install auto
date > /home/ec2-user/stoptime

#!/bin/bash -v
date > /home/ec2-user/starttime
yum update -y aws-cfn-bootstrap
yum update -y wget
yum update -y curl
# Set Timezone
timedatectl set-timezone UTC
# Install lsof locate and smbclient
yum install -y sysstat lsof mlocate samba-client
#Change Name of server to match new hostname
hostname lx238cpodsql02d.na.sysco.net
echo lx238cpodsql02d.na.sysco.net > /etc/hostname

# sh -c "hostname  cpodsql-$(curl http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/local-ipv4/ -s)d.na.sysco.net"
#sh -c "echo  cpodsql-$(curl http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/local-ipv4/ -s)d.na.sysco.net" > /etc/hostname
####################################
#Add Users to server
####################################
useradd -m -g aix -c "James Owen, Cloud Enablement Team" jowe6212
useradd -m -g aix -c "Mike Rowland, Enterprise Architect" mrow7849
useradd -m -g aix -c "Fernando Nieto, App Dev" fnie6886
useradd -m -g aix -c "Sagar Shetty, App Dev" sshe7956
####################################
# Download and Install MS SQL Server 2017
####################################
cd /tmp
# curl https://packages.microsoft.com/config/rhel/7/mssql-server.repo > /etc/yum.repos.d/mssql-server.repo
# yum install -y mssql-server
curl -o /etc/yum.repos.d/mssql-server.repo https://packages.microsoft.com/config/rhel/7/mssql-server-2017.repo
yum install -y mssql-server
# Setup /opt/mssql/bin/mssql-conf setup
####################################
# Increase open file limits
####################################
sh -c "echo \"*   soft   nofile   10240\" >> /etc/security/limits.conf"
sh -c "echo \"*   hard   nofile   20240\" >> /etc/security/limits.conf"
####################################
# Install Splunk Universal Forwarder
####################################
cd /tmp
wget -O splunkforwarder-6.6.1-aeae3fe0c5af-linux-2.6-x86_64.rpm 'https://www.splunk.com/bin/splunk/DownloadActivityServlet?architecture=x86_64&platform=linux&version=6.6.1&product=universalforwarder&filename=splunkforwarder-6.6.1-aeae3fe0c5af-linux-2.6-x86_64.rpm&wget=true'
chmod 744 splunkforwarder-6.6.1-aeae3fe0c5af-linux-2.6-x86_64.rpm
rpm -i splunkforwarder-6.6.1-aeae3fe0c5af-linux-2.6-x86_64.rpm
cd /opt/splunkforwarder
./bin/splunk start --accept-license
./bin/splunk enable boot-start
# Configure to run as a deployment client
#-----------------------------------
./bin/splunk set deploy-poll splunkdeploy.na.sysco.net:8089 -auth admin:changeme
# Configure forwarder to send logs to Splunk Indexer
#-----------------------------------
./bin/splunk add forward-server splunkindex.na.sysco.net:9997 -auth admin:changeme
./bin/splunk restart
####################################
# Install CodeDeploy
####################################
yum install ruby -y
wget https://aws-codedeploy-us-east-1.s3.amazonaws.com/latest/install
chmod +x ./install
./install auto
date > /home/ec2-user/stoptime
